name: alephsson

body.origin:
|- wss(crn(cale), con0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cale)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
-| diffsc(hs0, crn(cale))
-| diffsc(hs0, con0)
body.pretty:
⊢ ran(aleph)⊆ On
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ran(aleph)→ hs0 ∈ On)

⊣ d(hs0, On)

comment: The class of transfinite cardinals (the range of the aleph function) is a subclass of the class of ordinal numbers. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2003.)
